title: Flipkart Acquires Ans Commerce To Strengthen E-commerce System Via Technological Innovation | Mint - Mint
content: Flipkart Acquires Ans Commerce To Strengthen E-commerce System Via Technological Innovation | Mint  Mint
description: ANS will continue to operate as an independent business under its existing leadership team, post the acquisition..Flipkart and ANS deal is expected to close in the second half of 2022, subject to customary closing conditions.
